channel.title: Milanjovanovic.tech on .NET Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Milanjovanovic.tech on .NET Ramblings

item.title: The New .slnx Solution Format (migration guide)
item.description: See what changes in .slnx, how to convert your existing .sln, and what to watch out for in CI. Link to article: https://www.milanjovanovic.tech/blog/the-new-slnx-solution-format-migration-guide

item.title: DbContext is Not Thread-Safe: Parallelizing EF Core Queries the Right Way
item.description: Learn how to safely parallelize EF Core queries to improve performance by using IDbContextFactory to create isolated contexts, avoiding the thread-safety exceptions caused by sharing a single DbContext instance. Link to article: https://www.milanjovanovic.tech/blog/dbcontext-is-not-thread-safe-parallelizing-ef-core-queries-the-right-way
